Response C7M3PressBOrator
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Biker C7M3GeneratorSpeak foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule C7M3PressBOrator
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorPress PanicEventBiker Ismapc7m3_Port
	ApplyContext "SaidCreshendoStartNear:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3PressBOrator
}

}

{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorOn Ismapc7m3_Port IsFirstGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent

	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3Generator
}

{

}

	ApplyContext "_auto_C7M2CrowsFlySpeak:1:0,WarnMegaMob:1:300,SaidSpecialWarn:1:30"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M2CrowsFlyBOrator
}
